title: DOES_LATEST_BRIEF_STRING_EXIST
content:
0x5E657EF1099EDD650x91A081A1// DoesLatestBriefStringExist
BOOL DOES_LATEST_BRIEF_STRING_EXIST(int briefValue);Parameters:briefValue: A value indicating brief text.Used in pi_menu.c. Checks if there is a brief entry for specified value.
Values:
0 - Dialogue brief
1 - Help text brief
2 - Mission Objective brief
